actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the reporting of tips in the case of certain food and beverage establishments.

summary.text: Repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code relating to reporting by employers of tips in the case of certain food and beverage establishments.

titles.title: A bill to repeal certain provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 relating to the reporting of tips in the case of certain food and beverage establishments.
